title: Can we use the internet without a data pack? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yeah you can certainly use the internet even if you don’t have a data pack. You can use the Wi-Fi service from your ISP and use the internet or can use the dial up connection and use internet. But almost half of the world recommends Wi-Fi for surfing as your data pack expires early if you use it much. Dial up is ignored because it has a very less speed-56 kbps or less and has to be dialed up every time you use the internet. Wi-fi has a speed of at least 256 kbps or above. This is the way you can use internet without a data pack.
If you are from India than data packs are too low. Thanks to JIO. Get your recharge done it would be cheapest.
